title: Bonus 41: Baruch and Jeremiah, with Gil Kidron
itunes:title: Bonus: Baruch and Jeremiah, with Gil Kidron
description: In this bonus episode, Gil Kidron and I discuss Gil's theory that the scribe Baruch was instrumental in writing (or editing or redacting) the book of Genesis, using the life of his master the prophet Jermiah as a model.
content:encoded: In this bonus episode, Gil Kidron and I discuss Gil's theory that the scribe Baruch was instrumental in writing (or editing or redacting) the book of Genesis, using the life of his master the prophet Jermiah as a model.

itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Gil Kidron
